name: Earthbound D&D 2 Teaser
description:
A very short walk-around game regarding the story for a D&D campaign.

Controls: 

Movement- WASD or Directional Keys

Interact- Z

A small teaser for my upcoming Earthbound D&D campaign. I decided to try GB Studio for the first time, I like it a lot! With that said, I did end up reusing several assets that came with the initial download of GB Studio. If you would like to know what exactly I reused go ahead and make a comment and I'll reply.

Try interacting with a bunch of stuff, I tried to add a lot of text.

Sorry, there is no music
